title: Tech Celebrates Outstanding Faculty, Staff Members | News Center - Georgia Tech News Center
content: Tech Celebrates Outstanding Faculty, Staff Members | News Center  Georgia Tech News Center
description: The following members of the Tech community were honored at the 2022 Faculty and Staff Honors Luncheon on Friday, April 29. See photos from this year's event.
